hero.subheadline:
SpyneJS is built to restore structure, clarity, and long-term reasoning to frontend development — especially in an AI-driven era.

We focus on explicit architecture, predictable behavior, and systems that can evolve without accumulating technical debt.
hero.headline: Our Mission

data.headline: Section Headline
data.subheadline: Optional subhead text that provides context for the cards below.

props.styles: .where-we-are { display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: flex-start; gap: 3rem; } .where-we-are .location-left { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1.5rem; } .where-we-are .location-title { font-size: 2.6rem; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0; color: var(--text-1); } .where-we-are .location-subtitle { font-size: 1.2rem; color: var(--text-2); margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0; } .where-we-are .location-image-wrap { width: 100%; max-width: 500px; border-radius: var(--radius-lg); overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--elevation-1); } .where-we-are .location-image { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; } .where-we-are .location-map-wrap { flex: 1; align-self: stretch; min-width: 420px; max-width: 600px; border-radius: var(--radius-lg); overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--elevation-1); display: flex; } .where-we-are .location-map-iframe { align-self: stretch; width: 100%; height: 100%; min-height: 420px; border: 0; } @media(max-width: 980px) { .where-we-are { flex-direction: column; } .where-we-are .location-map-wrap { width: 100%; max-width: none; } .where-we-are .location-title { font-size: 2.2rem; } }

data.title: Where We Are
data.subtitle: Based in New York City, working with teams around the world in an amazing place.

props.styles: .contact-us { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 2rem; max-width: 720px; } .contact-us .contact-title { font-size: 2.6rem; line-height: 1.1; margin: 0; color: var(--text-1); } .contact-us .contact-subtitle { font-size: 1.2rem; color: var(--text-2); margin: 0 0 1rem 0; }

data.title: Contact Us
data.subtitle: Have a question or want to get in touch? Send us a message and we’ll respond promptly.
